abstract: The prelims comprise: Properties of infinite Voronoi diagramsProperties of Poisson Voronoi diagramsUses of Poisson Voronoi diagramsSimulating Poisson Voronoi and Delaunay cellsProperties of Poisson Voronoi cellsStochastic processes induced by Poisson VoronoidiagramsSectional Voronoi diagramsAdditively weighted Poisson Voronoi diagrams: the Johnson-Mehl modelHigher order Poisson Voronoi diagramsPoisson Voronoi diagrams on the surface of a sphereProperties of Poisson Delaunay cellsOther random Voronoi diagrams
